title: Before + After: This Artist’s Sydney Terrace Feels Like A Fancy Hotel
description: Sydney-based artist Annalisa Ferraris and Smokebush Studio landscape designer Nathan White felt like they’d ‘struck gold’ when they came across a dated, but light-filled, 1880s terrace in Paddington. The creative couple has since put their own spin on the Victorian home, drawing inspiration from old-world hotels in Europe to create dreamy personal details — from a blue bar designed for serving martinis, to the kitchen that feels like it’s straight out of a French bistro!
author: The Design Files
